code: import React from'react';import'./index.css';import galeria from'./assets/galeria';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DetallesCasa=_ref=>{let{casa}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"detalles-casa",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Casa en Venta"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"galeria",children:casa.fotos.map((foto,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:galeria[foto],alt:`Foto ${index+1}`},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"detalles",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Metros Cuadrados:"})," ",casa.area]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Barrio:"})," ",casa.barrio]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Precio:"})," $",casa.precio]})]})]});};export default DetallesCasa;
